resources.string: Accaren-ik n tbaḍnit ad d-ttwaseknen dagi.

%1$s iseffeḍ amazray-ik n unadi d tunigin seg waccaren n tunigin tusligin mi ara tent-tmeḍleḍ neɣ mi ara teffɣeḍ seg usnas. Ɣas wama aya ur yettarra ara d udrig deg yismal web neɣ deg usaǧǧaw-ik n unekcum Internet, aya ad k-yeǧǧ ad tḥarzeḍ tabaḍnit n urmud-ik srid i wid yesseqdacen ibenk-ik.
Tiktiwin tigejdanin yuzzlen ur nṣeḥḥi ara
Ur ttaǧǧa ara akk later ɣef yibenk-a
%1$s itekkes inagan n tuqqna, azray, akked yisefka n yismal web mi ara tmedleḍ akk accaren usligen. %2$s
Anwa i izemren ad iwali armud-iw?
Senker iccer uslig uḍfir s yiwen usiti kan.
Tzemreḍ ad tesbaduḍ %1$s akken ad yeldi iseɣwan s wudem awurman deg yisnasen.
Tamahilt-nneɣ n tbaḍnit iǧehden aṭas akka ar tura iɛezzel ineḍfaren gar yismal.
Issin ugar ɣef ummesten asemday mgal inagan n tuqqna
Sit dagi i usenker n tɣimit tamaynut. Kkes azray-ik·im, inagan n tuqqna — kullec.
Rbeḥ akud s unagraw amaynut n tunigin
Afeggag-a yettnefḍas mi ara tedrurmeḍ d akessar i wakken ad d-trebḥeḍ tallunt.
Deg usmel web, afeggag-a yettnefḍas mi ara tedrurmeḍ d akessar i wakken ad d-trebḥeḍ tallunt.
Isɛa anekcum ɣer tkamiṛat. Ddu ɣer iɣewwaṛen Android, sit ɣef tisirag, sakin senned sireg.
Sbadu amdel awurman n icarren yeldin ur twalaḍ ara deg ussan, imalasen, agguren ineggura.
Accaren ur tesneqdeḍ ara snat ledwaṛ ad ttusnekzen ɣer da.
%1$s izmer ad imdel accaren i twalaḍ ayyur iɛeddan.
Sken tqeffalt n meṛṛa accaren n melmi kan
Mtawi awalen n uεeddi, accaren akked wayen niḍen
Ales qqen i wakken ad tesnekreḍ amtawi
Askar n tɣuri, suqel, siggez, bḍu, ldi deg usnas
Askar n tɣuri, siggez, bḍu, ldi deg usnas
Rnu ticraḍ n yisebtar, inegzumen, asebtar agejdan, tafrant, PDF
Sireg isumar n unadi deg yisfuyla n tunigin tusligin?
%s ad yazen sekra n wayen i tettaruḍ deg ufeggag n tansiwin ɣer umsedday-inek n unadi s wudem amezwer.
Nadi srid seg ufeggag n tansiwin
Snirem asebtar-ik·im agejdan yettwasagnen. Accaren imaynuten, ticraḍ n yisebtar d yigmaḍ n unadi ad d-banen deg-s.
Ugar n yiniten. Tudert tabaḍnit igerrzen ugar. Tuṭṭfa deg tbaḍnit n yimdanen mačči d anadi ɣef tedrimt.
Abeddel seg ugdil ɣer wayeḍ fessus ugar ɣef wayen iɛeddan
Kemmel seg wanda i tḥebseḍ s useqdec n waccaren ɣef yibenkan-nniḍen ara d-ibanen akka tura ɣef usebter-ik·im agejdan.
Accaren-ik·im mtawan! Kemmel seg wanda i tḥebseḍ ɣef yibenk-ik·im-nniḍen.
Ilɣa ttɛawanen ad tgeḍ ugar akked %s
Mtawi iccaren-ik•im gar yibenkan, sefrek isadaren, awi iwellihen akken ad tfarseḍ deg ummesten n tbaḍnit n %s, d wugar.
Wali ayɣer aṭas i iḥemmlen Firefox
Tunigin tusligt s wugar n yifranen
Iminig-nneɣ tettallit yiwet n tkebbanit ur nettnadi ɣef tedrimt, tessewḥal tikebbaniyin ara ak-iḍefren deg web.
Ugar n 100 yimelyan n yimdanen mmestnen tabaḍnit-nsen s ufran n yiminig n tkebbanit ur nettnadi ara ɣef tedrimt.
Ineḍfaren i yettwassnen? Ttusweḥlen s wudem awurman. Isiɣzaf? Ԑreḍ-iten i 700. Ifuyla PDFs? Imeɣri-nneɣ usliɣ yessifsus asefrek-nsen.
Iminig-nneɣ tettallit yiwet n tkebbanit ur nettnadi ɣef tedrimt, tessewḥal tikebbaniyin ara ak-iḍefren deg web.\n\nIssin ugar ɣef tsertit-nneɣ n tbaḍnit.
Mmesten iman-ik s ttawil n uwgelhen mi ara tɛeddiḍ seg yibenk ɣer wayeḍ
Mi ara teqqneḍ rnu ad tremdeḍ amtawi, taɣellist tettwaseǧhed. Firefox yettwgelhin awalen-ik uffiren, ticraḍ n yisebtar, akked wayen niḍen.
Firefox ittewgelhin awalen uffiren, ticraḍ n yisebtar, d wugar mi ara tremdeḍ amtawi.
Ilɣa ad ak-ɛawnen ad teqqimeḍ d aɣellsan s Firefox
Azen s wudem aɣellsan accaren seg yibenk ɣer wayeḍ, tesnirmeḍ timahilin timaynutin n ummesten n tudert tabaḍnit deg Firefox.
Ɛreḍ iwiǧit n unadi n Firefox
Er Firefox ɣef ugdil agejdan i unekcum uzrib ɣer yiminig yebnan ɣef uqader n tudert tabaḍnit, iyessewḥalen ineḍfaren ger yismal.
Ffer imseddayen i d-ibanen deg wumuɣ n unadi
Imseddayen i d-ibanen deg wumuɣ n unadi
Sireg tuṭṭfa n ugdil deg tunigin tusligt
Ma yella yettusireg, accaren usligen ad d-banen ula d nutni ma yili aṭas n yisnasen i yeldin
Amsewḥel n yiɣarracen n yinagan n tuqqna
Amsewḥal n uɣerrac n yinagan n tuqqna deg tunigin tusligt
Asmel-a ur yettusefrak ara akka tura
Rmed amsewḥel n yiɣerracen n yinagan n tuqqna i %1$s?
Sens amsewḥel n yiɣerracen n yinagan n tuqqna i %1$s?
%1$s ur yezmir ara ad yagi issutar n trusi n yinagan n tuqqna s wudem awurman ɣef usmel-a. Tzemreḍ ad tazneḍ assuter i tallalt n usmel-a ɣer sdat.
Sens ma d %1$s ad yesfeḍ inagan n tuqqna sakin ad yales asali n usmel-a. Atagi ad ak-isuffeɣ neɣ ad isilem tikarḍiwin-ik n tiɣin.
Rmed-it syen %1$s ad yeɛreḍ ad yagi s wudem awurman akk iɣarracen n yinagan n tuqqna ɣef usmel-a.
%1$s yugi inagan n tuqqna i kečč
Drus n usedhu d yinagan n tuqqna ara ak-iḍefren ɣef usmel-a.
Ɛreḍ ad teqqneḍ s wudem awurman ɣer yismal s useqdec n uneggaf n uwgelhen HTTPS i tɣellist ɛlayen.
Ahat, asmel web ur issefrak ara s sshala HTTPS.
Yezmer daɣen ad tili d aẓḍam. Ma yella tkemmleḍ ɣer usmel-a web, ur ilaq ara akk ad taruḍ agbur amḥulfu. Ma yella tkemmleḍ, f askar HTTPS kan ara yensen i kra n wakud i usmel-a.
Aqeddac i umtawi neɣ amiḍan n Mozilla yettwasenfel, Ffeɣ seg usnas akken ad iddu usnifel…
Qqen ɣer waccaren yemtawan, ticraḍ n yisebtar, awalen uffiren d wugar n wayen-nniḍen.
Ales tuqqna akken ad ikemmel umtawi
Sken isumar n tkatut ɣef afus
Mudd tallalt i %1$s s uskan n yisumar i d-yettuwellhen sya ɣer da
Awi isumar seg web yeqqnen ɣer unadi-k·m
Amdal n usnas i usnes n yibeddilen…
Ma yella tumneḍ asiɣzef-a, tzemreḍ ad as-tmuddeḍ tisirag i yal asmel web.
Asiɣzef ur yesri kra n tsiregt.
Tagrumma n yisiɣzaf tettwabeddel. Ffeɣ seg usnas akken ad ddun yibeddilen…
Tegguma ad d-trader tugna n ugilal
Tegguma ad tbeddel tugna n ugilal
Fren tugna n ugilal ara yemmeslayen yid-k•m.
Smiren ugar n tugniwin n ugilal
Snirem ugar n 100 yisiɣzaf imaynuten ara ak·akem-yeǧǧen ad tsagneḍ Firefox.
Isiɣzaf nsan i kra n wakud

Yiwen neɣ ugar n yisiɣzaf ḥebsen, rran anagraw-ik d arurkid. %1$s ur yessaweḍ ara ad yales asenker n usiɣzef(yisiɣzaf).

Isiɣzaf ugin ad alsen tanekra ɣef teɣzi n tiɣimit-a.
\Kkes neɣ sens iziɣzaf-a, ahat ad yefru wugur-a.
Ԑreḍ allus n usenker n yisiɣzaf
Senfel awal-ik·im uffir, sefrek alqaḍ n yisefka neɣ kkes amiḍan-ik·im
Isem n yibenk ur yezmir ara ad yili d ilem.
Ilɣa n yiccaren yettwaremsen seg Firefox ɣef yibenlan-nniḍen.
Tisuraf ad k-ǧǧent ad tsenseḍ aùùesten mgal aḍfaṛ i kra n yismal.
Ad yebḍu isefka ɣef timellit, aseqdec, arrum d wudem n yiminig-ik i Mozilla akken ad aɣ-d-yefk afus i usnerni n %1$s

Lqeḍ tiɣawsiwin i yesεan aẓal ɣur-k·m.\n Semlilil akk inadiyen ittcabin, ismal, d iccaren i unekcum arurad ticki.
Akken ad tazneḍ iccer, qqen ɣer Firefox xarsum ɣef yiwen n yibenk.

Af kra iqerben. Neɣ snirem kra yessedhayen.
Ttxil-k ɛawen Firefox ad igerrez ugar s uɛemmer n uḥedqus-a.
Aḍris-a d amedya. akken ad tezṛeḍ amek ara d-iban u dris mi ara ad tesneɣseḍ neɣ ad ternuḍ tuɣzi deg iɣewwaṛen.
Semɣer neɣ senɣes teɣzi n uḍris n yismal web
Teɣzi n tsefsit ad temṣada akked iɣewwaren Android. Sens aɣewwar-a akken ad tesferkeḍ teɣzi n tsefsit.

Ad yekkes s wudem awurman isefka n tunigin ticki tferneḍ "Ffeɣ" seg umuɣ agejdan

Ittekkkes azray (ula d azray yettumtawan seg yibenkan niḍen)
%s ad yekkas isefka n tunigin yettwafernen.
Deg uselkim-ik, ldi Firefox sakin kcem ɣer https://firefox.com/pair
Seqdec tansa n yimayl deg umḍiq-is
Ulac amiḍan? <u>Rnu yiwen</u> i umtaw n Firefox gar yibenkan.

Ur izmir ara ad yeẓreg ikaramen imewar
Tura, Ammesten asemday mgal inagan n tuqqna, d ẓẓerb-nneɣ iǧehden ugar mgal ineḍfaren n gar yismal ar tura.
%s ad k-yemmesten seg tuget n yineḍfaṛen yettwassnen i yeṭṭafaṛen ayen i txeddmeḍ srid.
Isebtar ad d-alin s wudem amagnu, maca ad sweḥlen drus n yineḍfaren.
Ayen iweḥlen s ummesten n tizeɣt mgal aḍfaṛ

Ayen iweḥlen s ummesten n uḥriṣ mgal aḍfaṛ
Fren anwi ineḍfaren akked yisekripten ara tesweḥleḍ.

Ɛzel inagan n tuqqna gar yismal
Ssuter i yismal web ur snuzuyen, ur beṭṭun isefka-w
Talast n tezmert n yiẓeḍwa n tmetti deg uḍfaṛ n urmud-ik n tunigin deg web.
Inagan n tuqqna i uḍfaṛ gar yismal
Ad isewḥel inagan n tuqqna i seqdacen iberraḥen n udellel akked tkebbaniyin n tesledt i ulqaḍ n yisefka-ik n tunigin deg ddeqs n yismal.
Ammesten asemday mgal inagan n tuqqna iɛezzel inagan n tuqqna ɣef usmel ideg telliḍ, ineḍfaren n udellel ur ssawaḍen ara ad ak·akem-ḍefren seg usmel ɣer wayeḍ.
Ad isewḥel yir iskripten ad kecmen ɣer yibenk-ik akken ad kksen tadrimt tumḍint.
Ad isewḥel alqaḍ n yisefka yettwammalen s wudem asuf ɣef yibenk-ik daɣen wid i izemren ad ttwasqedcen i uḍfar.
Ad isewḥel alqaḍ n yisefka yettwammalen s wudem asuf ɣef yibenk-ik daɣen wid i izemren ad ttwasqedcen i uḍfar.
Ad isewḥel adellel, tividyutin akked ugbur-nniḍen i d-yekka beṛṛa n usmel, win i igebren tangalt n uḍfaṛ. Izmer ad iḥaz kra n tmahilin n usmel.
Ammesten yennerna mgal aḍfaṛ yensa i yismal-a web
D acu i d maynut deg %s
Yesfaḍay inagan n tuqqna yettusbadun s yiwellhen n yismal web n uḍfar yettwassnen.
Iremmmed ammesten s udsil umḍin i useḥbes n yir idsilen umḍinen.
Kra n yineḍfaren yettwaṛecmen ddaw-a yekkes-asen usewḥel amuran ɣef usebter-a acku temyigweḍ yid-sen*.
Tignit n usmenyif n tasureft i ummesten yettwasǧehden mgal aḍfar
Umuɣ n tseɣtit: %1$d senned s uẓelmaḍ akken ad irmed
Tzemreḍ s sshal ad ternuḍ asmel-a web ɣer ugdil agejdan n yibenk-inek·inem i wakken ad tesɛuḍ anekcum askudan d tunigin taruradt s termt i icuban asnas.
Ččar syen sekles ismawen n useqdac d wawalen uffiren ma tesseqdaceḍ %1$s.

Ččar ismawen n useqdac d wawalen uffiren deg yisnasen-nniḍen ɣef yibenk-ik·im.
Mtawi awalen n uεeddi gar yibenkan
Awalen n uεeddi i yettwaskelsen neɣ yemtawan s %s ttwabdaren-d dagi. Akk awalen n uεeddi i teskelseḍ ttwawgelhen.
%s ur yesseklas ara awalen n uεeddi i yismal i d-yettwabdaren dagi.
%s ur yesseklas ara awalen n uεeddi i yismal-a.

Rmed akken ad teǧǧeḍ asemɣer neɣ asemẓi s sin n yiḍudan ula deg yismal web i yessewḥalen aya.

Ma ulac aɣilif, rmed amtawi n waccaren.
Ulac ɣur-k accarren yeldin deg Firefox deg yibenkan-inek-nniḍen.
Wali tabdart n waccaren seg yibenkan-ik-nniḍen.
I tmerna n unezgum amaynut, kkes yiwen. Sit aṭas ɣef usmel syen fren kkes.
Wid yettbeddan fell-aɣ akked tudert-ik tabaḍnit
Firefox izmer ad imdel accaren i twalaḍ aggur iɛeddan.
Sbadu iseɣwan seg yismal web, seg yimaylen d yiznan i twaledyawt s wudem awurman deg Firefox.
Rmed tilisɣelt i tuzna n yisefka.
Axlaḍ n yilɣa inaflasen d yirinaflasen
Tamuɣli s wazal-is seg yilɣa imaynuten
Amek ara nettguccul alɣu n tɣara
Nesseqdac tatiknulujit AI seg %s sɣur Mozilla akken ad nessefqed arkad n yiceggiren n ufaris. Aya ad k-iεawen kan ad tektaleḍ taɣara n uceggir, mačči taɣara n ufaris.
Ad nmudd asekkil n ugemmay i yiceggiren ɣef yal afaris, seg A ɣer F.
Iceggiren igerrzen. Nettwali iceggiren zemren ad d-ilin seg yimsaɣen n tidet i d-yeǧǧan iceggiren imeɣtiyen, ur nebni ɣef tḥila.
Nettwali iwellihen sdukklen iwellihen inaflasen d yiwellihen arinaflasen.
Iceggiren ur yettwamanen ara. Nettwali iceggiren zemren ad ilin d tikellax neɣ kkan-d seg yimciggar ur nesεi azal.
Alɣu n amwati yebna kan ɣef yiceggiren i nettwali deg-sen taneflest.
Asebruraq seg %s n yiceggiren deg 80 n wussan-a ineggura i nettwali yella lettkal fell-asen.
Amek i yesguccul %s alɣu n tɣara
Sken adellel deg amsenqad n tamawt
Ad twaliḍ adellel i yifarisen yesεan aṭas azal. Ntegg kan laman deg wid yesεan iceggiren yettwamanen. %s
Amsenqad n tamawt yella-d s lmendad n %s
Ulac ddeqs n tamiwin akka tura
Mi ara yilin aṭas n yiwenniten ɣef ufaris-a, taɣara-s ad tettwaktazel.
Ma twalaḍ afaris-a yuɣal-d deg taggazt, ini-aɣ-t-id, ad nexdem akken ara nessefqed iceggiren.
Mmel tuɣalin n ufaris deg tawsa
Ilaq ad nwali talɣut ɣef tamiwin yerzan afaris-a sya ɣer 24 yisragen. Ttxil-k·m uɣal-d ticki.
Ur nezmir ara ad nsenqed tamawin-a
Nesḥasef, ur nezmir ara ad nessefqed taɣara n ucegger i kra n wanawen n yifarisen. Amedya, tikarḍiwin n yisefkan d yisuddam n tvidyutin, aẓawan d wuraren.
Ilaq ad nwali talɣut ɣef tamiwin yerzan afaris-a sya ɣer 24 yisragen. Ttxil-k·m uɣal-d ticki.
Ulac talɣut i yellan akka tura
Aql-aɣ nettmuqul ad nefru ugur. Ttxil-k·m ɛreḍ ticki.
Senqed tuqqna ɣer uzeṭṭa syen ɛreḍ asali n usebter i tikkelt niḍen.
